title: Pset_SensorTypeIonConcentrationSensor
description: A device that senses or detects ion concentration such as water hardness. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

SubstanceDetected.title: SubstanceDetected
SubstanceDetected.description: Identification of the substance that is being detected according to chemical formula.  For example, calcium carbonate is 'CaCO3'

SetPointConcentration.title: SetPointConcentration
SetPointConcentration.description: The ion concentration value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.
